name: Battlefleet Gothic, Skeletal Dissonance: Dawn of War
name_original: Battlefleet Gothic, Skeletal Dissonance: Dawn of War
description:
In order to keep up with the demand for collagen, cemeteries around the world have been converted into gelatin farms. The dead are harvested for their bones, which are then used to produce a range of beauty products.

Every day, a skeleton is on the run, hunted for their bones.

This is one of their stories.

---

/uj This is probably the dumbest game submitted to the jam. As silly as it is, I enjoyed making it so hopefully you guys enjoy it too.

Playtime: 5-10 mins (depending on route)
